:::Torca:::

::He rolls under the missle and fires 25 shots at Skulletron::
Torca: Dont worry-this ship is strong!



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Klant, having taken no damage at all except from one shot by 
BrightBlade, hopped out of the way of the missile.
> 
> Klant: The base is screwed anyway.
> 
> Klant simply fires once at Skulletron...
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: dcoburn 
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Thursday, November 09, 2000 4:04 PM
>   Subject: Da, Klant, Da, Toca, DA! Da You Son of A BEEEEPPPP
> 
> 
>   ::Skulletron::
>    
>             Skulletron saw the missile coming from this other guy, 
and was quick to dodge it.
>    
>            "I'LL KILL ALL OF YOU MAXIMALS!!!!" Skulletron yelled.
>    
>             Mech fluid continued to leak from Skulletron's body.
>    
>            He fell down on his hands and knees. 
>    
>           "Can't.....Take......The.....Pain........." He said.
>    
>           Skulletron got up, and fired one seeker missile at Torca, 
and another one at Klant.
>    
>           "Die you fools!!!!" He yelled.
> 
>         eGroups Sponsor
